com.magicbinder.criterias.base.value

Class SelectValue

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.magicbinder.criterias.base.value.CriteriaValue
      • com.magicbinder.criterias.base.value.SelectValue
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICriteria, java.io.Serializable

    public class SelectValue
extends CriteriaValue
    A SelectValue is used to query another table in a criteria. (Use only with IN type criterias) Example : SELECT * FROM table1 WHERE id IN ( SELECT refKey FROM refTable WHERE criteria);
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
